ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: well let me explain myself then, i was assuming he was going to guk alone considering he had invis potions, i myself hate pickup groups (remember the threads
ygData.messageBody:
well let me explain myself then, i was assuming he was going to guk alone
considering he had invis potions, i myself hate pickup groups (remember the
threads named Group from hell? well i've had 2 in a row). So unless you get
to guk with a group, hope there's someone in the tower allready so ya can
join up with them, or ya might end up like me last night, with a warrior
getting to the bridge, yelling uh oh and training all the wizards and the
gibs to the BR. needless to say i didnt make it to the zone. So ya i hope
for him that unless he has a group allready, that the ass is camped or he'll
never get it alone.



-----Original Message-----
From: Jeffrey Sue [mailto:jsue@...]
Sent: Tuesday, August 08, 2000 2:59 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Guise


At 02:21 PM 8/8/00 -0400, you wrote:
>sure he can form a group, but most chances are the place is camped,
>secondly, if he just wants to go in and out, if its camped means he can be
>there for only a couple spawns as most often the masks rot away.

the room may be camped most of the time, i just disagreed immensely with
the part i quoted, i.e. ''first, hope that the ass/supp is camped''.





Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
